title: Speeding car overturns on Vajira Road crashing into 12 vehicles
body_lines: A speeding car skidded off the road and overturned near Visakha Vidyalaya on Vajira Road in Colombo last evening causing damages to more than 12 vehicles including 9 cars and two three wheelers.
Police said a cab was also damaged in the accident. They said the vehicles were parked near the school as the O\L examination was underway.

Investigation revealed the accident took place as the driver had lost control of the vehicle. Police also ruled out  rumors that the driver was under the influence of alcohol at the time of the accident.
Two persons including the driver were inside the car at the time of the accident and the driver was admitted to the Colombo National Hospital.
